channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump asks SCOTUS to toss E. Jean Carroll $5 million abuse, defamation verdict
item.description: President Trump on Monday petitioned the Supreme Court to review the $5 million civil verdict that found him liable for sexually abusing and defaming ...

item.title: Chuck Schumer faces mounting calls from Democrats to resign as Senate leader
item.description: A growing list of House Democrats and liberal grassroots groups is calling for Senate Minority Leader Chuck Schumer (D-N.Y.) to step down from leaders...

item.title: Trump says "we can reform" SNAP
item.description: President Trump criticized the Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program known as SNAP in an interview with Fox News' Laura Ingraham Monday night. Why...

item.title: Families sue Camp Mystic over Texas flood deaths
item.description: The operators of Camp Mystic are facing three separate lawsuits from families of some of the 27 people who died during Texas' catastrophic July floods...

item.title: Senate passes package to end record government shutdown
item.description: The Senate officially passed a bipartisan package Monday night to end the record-long government shutdown. Why it matters: After 40 days, eight Democr...

item.title: How every senator voted on the bill to reopen the government
item.description: See how your lawmaker voted.

item.title: How women feel about Trump’s presidency: Heartbreak, fatigue, gratitude
item.description: We asked women how they felt about Trump right after he won the election. One year later, we caught up with them to see how they feel now.

item.title: When neighbors lost SNAP benefits, the internet stepped in to feed them
item.description: People are influencing politics and increasingly finding food for their families by telling their stories of economic struggle online in ways that wer...

item.title: Trump says staunch ally Greene has ‘lost her way’
item.description: The Republican congresswoman accused the White House of focusing on foreign affairs instead of domestic ones.

item.title: Trump administration asks Supreme Court to intervene in SNAP fight again
item.description: The battle over funding for the nation’s largest anti-hunger program has left millions wondering how they will afford food.

item.title: Trump, stung by Republican losses, stands his ground on affordability
item.description: Democrats running on cost-of-living anxieties outperformed Republicans in Tuesday’s elections by greater-than-expected margins. The president chalked ...

item.title: Voters on Tuesday rewarded Democrats who addressed economic costs. Hours later, Trump said he delivered an 'economic miracle.'
item.description: A recent poll found a majority of Americans feel they’re spending more on groceries than they did a year ago.

item.title: Reaganomics in Jersey: Jack Ciattarelli has a supply-side dream if he’s elected governor this week
item.description: The Republican nominee has promised tax cuts and economic growth, but the numbers are fuzzy.

item.title: Trump's approval holds steady despite unpopular policies, per new NYT poll
item.description: Trump’s strength with Republicans on the economy could prove to be a boon for the GOP.

item.title: New poll reveals warning signs for Trump with Latino voters
item.description: A survey from the liberal-leaning group Somos Votantes shows Latino voters are souring on the president.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
